entry.title: [GRA][Web Hosting] - Clusters maintenance notification
entry.content:

Sep 30, 14:58 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Web Hosting offer.

This may temporarily affect on configuration tasks.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [GRA][Web Hosting] - Cluster 100 Incident notification
entry.content:
Oct 13, 09:00 UTC
Identified - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : After verification, our team is now fixing the issue, which was due to a software malfunction.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Oct 13, 07:11 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating an incident affecting our Web Hosting offering, which is causing temporary availability issue in the Cluster 100.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 13/10/2025 06:50 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some customers are temporarily unable to access their websites.
Customers Impact : Customers may encounter an error message on their websites.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident to fix it.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

entry.title: [Global][Domains] - Domains Name incident notification on .MG
entry.content:
Oct 10, 09:00 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our .MG Domains offer has been resolved.

Start time : 01/10/2025 06:30 UTC
End time : 10/10/2025 08:20 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a maintenance of one of our provider.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Oct 1, 07:10 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our .MG Domains offer, customers in the impacted zone are unable to perform some tasks on .MG.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 01/10/2025 06:30 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Multiple operations (Registration, Renew, Transfer, Restore, Delete) are temporarily unavailable for .MG domains.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to perform specified operations on .MG.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a maintenance of one of our provider.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilized to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

entry.title: [GLOBAL][Collaborative solutions] - MX Plan incident notification
entry.content:
Oct 9, 14:22 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our MX Plan offering has been resolved.

Start time : 09/10/2025 07:40 UTC
End time : 09/10/2025 14:05 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a software issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Oct 9, 08:34 UTC
Monitoring - Service has been fully restored since 09/10/2025 08:28 UTC. Monitoring remains active to ensure long-term stability.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 09/10/2025 07:40 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : MX Plan Webmail service was temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers were temporarily experiencing difficulties accessing their mailboxes.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Oct 9, 07:56 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our MX Plan offering.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 09/10/2025 07:40 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : MX Plan Webmail service is currently unavailable.
Customers Impact : Affected customers may experience difficulties accessing their mailboxes.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a software issue.
Workaround : Customers can access their mailbox via IMAP/POP.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
